# broider-gallery

An open collection of [broider](https://maxbittker.github.io/broider/) designs

## Contributing

Add your css class in a pull request to the [`broider.css`](broider.css) file with a note of authorship (or leave anonymous if you'd like).

For example:

```
/* designed by Tod Robbins: https://todrobbins.com */
.floral-cross {
  border-image: url("data:image/png;base64,") 28 /  28px / 0 round;
  border-width: 28px;
  border-style: solid;
}
```

[This is free and unencumbered software released into the public domain.](LICENSE.md)
